```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(targets)
```


# Load the data

```{r}
targets::tar_load(data)

temperature <- data$temperature |>
  filter(standort == "Zch_Stampfenbachstrasse")
rain <- data$rain |>
  filter(standort == "Zch_Stampfenbachstrasse")
```

# Inspect the data

```{r}
str(rain)
```
